solution_line_template: Since each chapter of the book has {pages_per_chapter} pages, Mitchell had read {chapters_read_before_4}*{pages_per_chapter} = <<{chapters_read_before_4}*{pages_per_chapter}={pages_first_ten}>>{pages_first_ten} pages from the first ten chapters.

After reading {pages_read_ch11} pages of the eleventh chapter, the total number of pages that Mitchell had read is {pages_first_ten}+{pages_read_ch11} = <<{pages_first_ten}+{pages_read_ch11}={pages_after_ch11}>>{pages_after_ch11}
The next two chapters that she read had {chapters_read_after_4}*{pages_per_chapter} = <<{chapters_read_after_4}*{pages_per_chapter}={pages_next_two}>>{pages_next_two} pages.
In total, Mitchell read {pages_after_ch11}+{pages_next_two} = <<{pages_after_ch11}+{pages_next_two}={total_pages}>>{total_pages} pages of the book that day.
